main event: Brilliant white flashes were observed over Japan, with military aircraft scrambled to investigate but no explosive sound reported.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 56 minutes.
The sighting was reported by both military and civilian sources.
Japanese police advised that they had made similar observations in the area.
The sighting occurred over a specific geographic region between certain coordinates.
The incident was initially classified but later declassified.
photographs: No photographs present in the report
